ComicInfo.Title: Belly of the Beast
ComicInfo.Series: DC Horror Presents: Sgt. Rock vs. the Army of the Dead
ComicInfo.Summary: Rock and Easy Company have had some fun defending themselves against Hitler’s undead goons, but now it’s time for them to have a gas when they go on the offensive and head behind enemy lines. And hey, speaking of gas, is that a flamethrower in your hands or are ya just happy to see me? Time to burn it all down or die trying, Easy Company!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-15 21:24:05. [CVDB956143]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brad Anderson, Christopher Mitten, Francesco Francavilla, Gary Frank
ComicInfo.Characters: Adolf Hitler, Bulldozer, Eva Braun, Four-Eyes, Jackie Johnson, Little Sure Shot, Long Round, Sgt. Rock, Short Round, Wee Willie
